name: Line Up
overview: Line Up is a computerized version of Connect 4 for the VIC-20. Two human players take turns dropping a colored token into 8 columns. Token stacks on top of teach other, and the first player to score 4 in a row vertically, horizontally, or diagonally is the winner. The game was developed by David Lacy and published in the December 1983 issue of VICTAPE Computing (a cassette based magazine service in the UK).
